casebody.data:
Dennis Milstein
v.
The Tower at Oak Hill Condominium Association and Lower Merion Township; Petition of The Tower at Oak Hill Condominium Association; Lower Merion Township and Dennis Milstein v. The Tower at Oak Hill Condominium Association NO. 726 MAL 2015
NO. 727 MAL 2015 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania April 26, 2016 Appeal from the Superior Court.

Disposition: Denied.
